name: Bejeweled Collar
lore:
&8Consumed on use

&aPet Items &7can boost pets in many powerful ways!
&7A pet can only hold one &aPet Item &7at a time.

&7&7Grants &6+25⸕ Mining Speed&7 and &6+10☘
&6Mining Fortune&7.

&egive it this item!
